description:
After all our practice, it was finally time for the play! I was so excited that I stayed up for two days making costumes for Sakura and Xiaolang. They looked so cute in them! Just as they were about to kiss in the play, the Dark card showed up and turned everything pitch black! Sakura noticed that she could still see herself though, and discovered it was because the Light card was within her! As she sealed up the cards, they hinted that Yue was somewhere nearby.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La nuit tombe sur le festival...
Sakura and the Blacked Out School Arts Festival
ซากุระกับงานโรงเรียนที่มืดมิด
さくらのまっくら学芸会
